alert.note: Alert for Ford; Iroquois; Kankakee (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 14 at 10:39AM CDT until October 14 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...HIGH FIRE DANGER TODAY... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR EAST CENTRAL ILLINOIS AND NORTHWEST INDIANA... * Affected Area...Newton, Jasper, Benton, Kankakee, Iroquois and Ford. * Timing...This afternoon and early evening * Winds...Southwest 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 20 percent. * Impacts...The combination of strong winds, very low relative humidity, and dry fuels will promote dangerous fire behavior. Any fires will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning should be postponed today.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
